title: All-in-one wallet card to spell end of individual credit card?
text:
All-in-one wallet card to spell end of individual credit card? 8:29am EST - 01:36 
A single card that allows shoppers to access various payment options from multiple accounts will be launched later this year. As Jim Drury reports, the Dynamics Wallet Card was launched globally at the International Consumer Electronics Show (CES) in Las Vegas in January and is also on display at the Mobile World Congress (MWC) in Barcelona.
